Could not be more proud to serve as Atlanta Technology Professionals (ATP)’s Director of #ATPCares and to be apart of an ALL volunteer origination that STRIVES to make a difference with underserved students and schools in the Atlanta community. Huge thank you again to ALL of our sponsors and members, because of YOU we are able to give back to non-profits like PowerMyLearning!

Happy Tuesday!! Optomi is hiring nationwide for Account Executives and Technical Recruiters!! If you or someone you know has 1+ year of IT staffing experience and is interested in endless career growth, competitive base/uncapped commission, and an outstanding company culture then contact me today! laurenwolf@optomi.com

I'm proud to announce that I’ve been selected as a member of Atlanta’s ONE Group by the JDRF Georgia Chapter. Honorees were selected based on their professional & philanthropic accomplishments, as well as their commitment to making a difference in the communities in which they live/work.

I'll be honored at The ONE Party on 11/15 at American Spirit Works. As an honoree, I’ve made a pledge to raise funds for type 1 Diabetes (T1D) research. I’d like to invite you to join me in support of this very worthy cause. I sincerely appreciate any contributions that you can make on my behalf to JDRF. Monies raised will make a tremendous impact in the fight against T1D.

JDRF is the leading global organization funding T1D research. JDRF’s goal is to progressively remove the impact of T1D from people’s lives until we achieve a world without T1D. As the largest charitable supporter of T1D research, JDRF has committed over $2 billion in research funding since 1970 & is currently sponsoring 65 clinical trials.
Here's the link to my fundraising page:
Thanks in advance for your support & generosity. Hope you can join me at The ONE Party on 11/15!

“DRIVING TOMORROW’S TECHNOLOGY WITH TODAY’S OPTIMUM TALENT.”Optomi is a market-leading tech staffing firm with a unique approach. By developing industry leading recruitment processes and utilizing innovative technologies, we are able to deploy the best project managers, business analysts and technologists in the ever-evolving spaces of mobile technology, network/system engineering, information security, data warehousing, cloud and application development…making us a leader in the IT staffing world.

As an account executive for Robert Half Technology, I specialize in helping clients find highly skilled IT candidates for immediate and project-based needs.  I only specialize in technology so I have a pulse on the market and know what best available candidates are available immediately.  Listed below are a few positions I can help with:-.Net Developers-PHP Developers-Java Developers-SQL DBA-Project Manager-Business Analyst-QA Analyst-Help desk-Desktop support-Network/System engineers-Security Architects/SpecialistsPlease feel free to reach me with any questions or needs.Andrew PenaAndrew.pena@rht.com602-224-2486

As Branch Manager, I oversee the contract recruiting team at Robert Half Technology, a leading provider of technology professionals on a contract and contract to hire basis.  I work as a Sales account executive on a daily basis providing my clients with top quality candidates for temporary positions. I specialize in both technical support services as well as development (both application and web).As a Branch Manager, I am responsible for overseeing 10 professionals, both Account Executives and Technical Recruiters.
Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

Founded in 2012, Opt2give is a program designed by Optomi to address the hunger epidemic on the U.S. One out of every 5 children go to bed hungry right in our own backyards. Opt2give provides under-resourced children with a weekend bag worth of food. Thousands of children have benefitted from the efforts of Opt2give and the IT staffing company Optomi that created the program.

December 28, 2015, Jim was a client of Andrew’s

I had the pleasure of working with Jim while his time at Quantumclean.  Jim is a very detail oriented SQL DBA and did amazing work both for Robert Half Technology and Quantumclean.  Jim and I worked together for nearly a year on a project together and he was extremely proactive in finding any problem and always had a solution identified in a timely manner.  Jim received nothing but great feedback from all of my clients and IT Managers that he encountered during his time with Robert Half.  He is very professional and would be a great addition to any team!  I would highly recommend Jim and would always work with Jim again in the future!

summary: As the Managing Director of the Austin branch for Optomi, Andrew Pena is responsible for driving the sales and recruiting productivity of the branch. This includes setting and managing expectations, identifying and attracting internal talent, managing P&L objectives and working with executive leadership to execute on market strategies.Andrew has always been committed to delivering great results.  He comes from a strong background in the staffing industry and brings five years of experience and achievements.  Andrew has a proven track record of leading sales teams and exceeding goals and will bring this culture and his innovative ideas to drive the success and growth of the Austin branch.Optomi not only “drives tomorrow’s technology with today’s optimum talent”, it also gives back to the community. Every business transaction allows the  rm to feed an under-resourced child for the week- end. Optomi’s Opt2give program has helped thousands of kids in the U.S. Their philosophy of “doing the right thing” permeates every aspect of the company.
name: Andrew Pena
